memberdef.name: setedgessideBT

briefdescription.para: Set bottom/top edge values for bathymetry array.

detaileddescription.para: Copies values from interior to boundary cells for bottom/top edges.

memberdef.argsstring: (T x, T y, T dx, F forcing)
memberdef.name: interp2BUQ

briefdescription.para: Interpolate value at (x, y) using either bilinear or blockmean interpolation.

detaileddescription.para: Chooses interpolation method based on grid spacing dx.

memberdef.argsstring: (T x, T y, T dx, F forcing)
memberdef.name: blockmean

briefdescription.para: Compute block mean value for (x, y) over grid spacing dx.

detaileddescription.para: Averages values in the forcing map over the block centered at (x, y).

memberdef.argsstring: (T x, T y, F forcing)
memberdef.name: interp2BUQ

briefdescription.para: Bilinear interpolation for value at (x, y) from forcing map.

detaileddescription.para: Performs bilinear interpolation using surrounding grid points in forcing map.

memberdef.argsstring: (float x, float y, StaticForcingP< float > forcing)

briefdescription.para: CPU routine for time interpolation of solution arrays.

detaileddescription.para: Interpolates between Uo and Un to compute Ux at a given time step.

memberdef.name: InterpstepGPU

detaileddescription.para: Interpolates between Uo and Un to compute Ux at a given time using shared memory.
